description: When a user imports a file, such as an .ESCN , .PNG , .OGG , or .WAV file, into the project, an IMPORT file is created in the same directory as the imported file. The IMPORT file name consists of the same name as the imported file, but with the .import extension appended to it. For example, when sample.wav is imported into the project, the IMPORT file is named sample.wav.import .
